0: Modern UI for Ansible, Terraform/OpenTofu, Bash and Pulumi

---
directory: /media/music
library: /data/library.db
import:
  move: true
  from_scratch: true
asciify_paths: true
group_albums: true
per_disc_numbering: true
paths:
  default: "$albumartist/[%if{$year,$year,0000}] $album%aunique{}/%if{$multidisc,$disc-}$track - $title"
  albumtype:soundtrack: "000-soundtracks/$album [%if{$year,$year,0000}]%aunique{}/%if{$multidisc,$disc-}$track - $title"
  comp: "000-compilations/$album [%if{$year,$year,0000}]%aunique{}/%if{$multidisc,$disc-}$track - %if{$artist,$artist - }$title"
  singleton: "000-non-album/$artist/$title"
plugins:
  - albumtypes # https://beets.readthedocs.io/en/stable/plugins/albumtypes.html
  - discogs # https://beets.readthedocs.io/en/stable/plugins/discogs.html
  - duplicates # https://beets.readthedocs.io/en//stable/plugins/duplicates.html
  - extrafiles # https://github.com/Holzhaus/beets-extrafiles
  - fetchart # https://beets.readthedocs.io/en/stable/plugins/fetchart.html
  - ftintitle # https://beets.readthedocs.io/en/stable/plugins/ftintitle.html
  - inline # https://beets.readthedocs.io/en/stable/plugins/inline.html
  - lastgenre # https://beets.readthedocs.io/en/stable/plugins/lastgenre.html
  - lyrics # https://beets.readthedocs.io/en/stable/plugins/lyrics.html
  - missing # https://beets.readthedocs.io/en/stable/plugins/missing.html
  - mbsync # https://beets.readthedocs.io/en/stable/plugins/mbsync.html
  - scrub # https://beets.readthedocs.io/en/stable/plugins/scrub.html
  - web # https://beets.readthedocs.io/en/stable/plugins/web.html
discogs:
  source_weight: 0.0
extrafiles:
  patterns:
      all:
        - '*.*'
fetchart:
  cautious: true
  sources: itunes *
item_fields:
  multidisc: 1 if disctotal > 1 else 0
lastgenre:
  canonical: yes
lyrics:
  fallback: ''
  synced: true
fuzzy:
web:
  reverse_proxy: true
  host: 0.0.0.0

1: until nc -w 1 -v $MYSQL_HOST:3306 || nc -w 1 -v $POSTGRES_HOST:5432; do echo "Waiting for database"; done

/hr/ghcr.io-bjw-s-helm-app-template-exte.title: external-dns helm release
/hr/ghcr.io-bjw-s-helm-app-template-exte.name: external-dns
/hr/ghcr.io-bjw-s-helm-app-template-exte.doc: ExternalDNS is a Kubernetes add-on that automatically manages the creation and updates of DNS records for services running in your cluster. It integrates with a variety of DNS providers, such as CloudFlare DNS, Amazon Route 53, Google Cloud DNS, and more, to ensure that your applications are easily accessible from anywhere with a DNS name. With ExternalDNS, you can simplify the process of managing DNS records for your home lab, eliminating the need for manual updates and reducing the risk of errors.

/hr/stevehipwell.github.io-helm-charts-t.title: thanos helm release
/hr/stevehipwell.github.io-helm-charts-t.name: thanos

0:
groups:
  - name: PrometheusWatcher
    rules:
      - alert: PrometheusDown
        annotations:
          summary: A Prometheus has disappeared from Prometheus target discovery
        expr: absent(up{job="kube-prometheus-stack-prometheus"})
        for: 5m
        labels:
          severity: critical
1:
groups:
  - name: PrometheusWatcher
    rules:
      - alert: PrometheusDown
        annotations:
          summary: A Prometheus has disappeared from Prometheus target discovery
        expr: absent(up{job="kube-prometheus-stack-prometheus"})
        for: 5m
        labels:
          severity: critical

/hr/stevehipwell.github.io-helm-charts-t.doc: Thanos is an open-source project that provides a highly available and horizontally scalable way to store and query time-series data in a Kubernetes cluster. It integrates with popular time-series databases, such as Prometheus, to provide a unified view of your monitoring and logging data. Thanos also provides features such as data compression and deduplication, making it an efficient solution for storing large amounts of time-series data. With Thanos, you can easily store, query, and analyze your home lab's monitoring and logging data, providing valuable insights into the performance and health of your applications.

1:
provider = "google"
auth_logging = true
cookie_domains = ".${FAMILY_DOMAIN}"
cookie_httponly = true
cookie_name = "_john_family_oauth"
cookie_refresh = "1h"
cookie_samesite = "lax"
cookie_secure = true
email_domains = [ "${FAMILY_DOMAIN}" ]
pass_access_token = true
pass_authorization_header = true
pass_basic_auth = false
request_logging = true
session_store_type = "cookie"
silence_ping_logging = true
set_authorization_header = true
set_xauthrequest = true
skip_jwt_bearer_tokens = true
skip_provider_button = true
ssl_insecure_skip_verify = false
standard_logging = true
upstreams = [ "static://200" ]
whitelist_domains = ".${FAMILY_DOMAIN}"
footer = "For Internal Family Use Only"
reverse_proxy = "true"
redirect_url = "https://sso.${FAMILY_DOMAIN}/oauth2/callback"

0:
<?php
  $CONFIG = array(
    'backgroundjobs_mode' => 'cron',
    'activity_expire_days' => 14,
    'allow_local_remote_servers' => true,
    'auth.bruteforce.protection.enabled' => true,
    'overwriteprotocol' => 'https',
    'overwrite.cli.url' => 'https://cloud.${SECRET_DOMAIN}',
    'trusted_domains' => array(
        0 => 'localhost',
        1 => 'cloud.${SECRET_DOMAIN}',
        2 => 'id.${SECRET_DOMAIN}',
    ),
    'trusted_proxies' => array(
        0 => '127.0.0.1',
        1 => '10.96.0.0/16'
    ),
    'forwarded_for_headers' => array(
      0 => 'HTTP_X_FORWARDED_FOR',
    ),

    'forbidden_filenames' =>
      array (
        0 => '.htaccess',
        1 => 'Thumbs.db',
        2 => 'thumbs.db',
        ),

    'appstoreenabled' => true,
    'knowledgebaseenabled' => false,
    'quota_include_external_storage' => false,
    'share_folder' => '/Freigaben',
    'skeletondirectory' => '',
    'trashbin_retention_obligation' => 'auto, 7',

    'memcache.local' => '\OC\Memcache\APCu',
    'memcache.distributed' => '\OC\Memcache\Redis',
    'memcache.locking' => '\OC\Memcache\Redis',
    'redis' => array(
      'host' => getenv('REDIS_HOST'),
      'port' => getenv('REDIS_HOST_PORT') ?: 6379,
      'password' => getenv('REDIS_HOST_PASSWORD'),
    ),

    'apps_paths' => array(
        0 => array (
                'path'     => OC::$SERVERROOT.'/apps',
                'url'      => '/apps',
                'writable' => false,
        ),
        1 => array (
                'path'     => OC::$SERVERROOT.'/custom_apps',
                'url'      => '/custom_apps',
                'writable' => true,
        ),
    ),

    'htaccess.RewriteBase' => '/',

    'mail_smtpmode' => 'smtp',
    'mail_smtptimeout' => 30,
    'mail_sendmailmode' => 'smtp',
    'mail_smtphost' => getenv('SMTP_HOST'),
    'mail_smtpport' => 25,
    'mail_smtpsecure' => '',
    'mail_smtpauth' => false,
    'mail_smtpauthtype' => '',
    'mail_smtppassword' => getenv('SMTP_PASSWORD'),
    'mail_smtpname' => getenv('SMTP_NAME'),
    'mail_from_address' => getenv('MAIL_FROM_ADDRESS'),
    'mail_domain' => getenv('MAIL_DOMAIN'),
    "mail_smtptimeout"  => 30,
    'mail_smtpstreamoptions' => array (
      'ssl' => array (
        'allow_self_signed' => true,
        'verify_peer' => false,
        'verify_peer_name' => false
        ),
      ),

    'enable_previews' => true,
    'enabledPreviewProviders' =>
        array (
      0 => 'OC\\Preview\\PNG',
      1 => 'OC\\Preview\\JPEG',
      2 => 'OC\\Preview\\GIF',
      3 => 'OC\\Preview\\BMP',
      4 => 'OC\\Preview\\XBitmap',
      5 => 'OC\\Preview\\Movie',
      6 => 'OC\\Preview\\PDF',
      7 => 'OC\\Preview\\MP3',
      8 => 'OC\\Preview\\TXT',
      9 => 'OC\\Preview\\MarkDown',
      10 => 'OC\\Preview\\HEIC',
      11 => 'OC\\Preview\\MKV',
      12 => 'OC\\Preview\\MP4',
      13 => 'OC\\Preview\\AVI',
      ),
    'preview_max_x' => 1024,
    'preview_max_y' => 768,
    'preview_max_scale_factor' => 1,

      // Circumvention for client freezes - https://github.com/nextcloud/desktop/issues/5094
    'bulkupload.enabled' => false,

    'backgroundjobs_mode' => 'webcron',
    'default_language' => 'de',
    'default_locale' => 'de_DE',
    'default_phone_region' => 'DE',
    'default_timezone' => 'Europe/Berlin',
    'maintenance_window_start' => 1,

  );

opcache.enable=1
opcache.interned_strings_buffer=64
opcache.max_accelerated_files=20000
opcache.memory_consumption=256
opcache.save_comments=1
opcache.revalidate_freq=60
opcache.validate_timestamps=0
opcache.jit=1255
opcache.jit_buffer_size=128M

session.save_handler = redis
session.save_path = "tcp://$${REDIS_HOST}:$${REDIS_HOST_PORT}?auth=$${REDIS_HOST_PASSWORD}"
redis.session.locking_enabled = 1
redis.session.lock_retries = -1
redis.session.lock_wait_time = 10000

[www]
pm = dynamic
pm.max_children = 256
pm.start_servers = 14
pm.min_spare_servers = 14
pm.max_spare_servers = 236
pm.max_requests = 500
pm.process_idle_timeout = 10s

1:
acl url_discovery path /.well-known/caldav /.well-known/carddav
http-request redirect location /remote.php/dav/ code 301 if url_discovery
option http-keep-alive
timeout server 120000ms
